amendment.description: To address disclosures by directors, officers, and principal stockholders of foreign private issuers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3703 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3703 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 3748. To address disclosures by directors, officers, and principal stockholders of foreign private issuers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3703 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3703 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
